nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@
+adapters:
+  invibes:
+    enabled: false
+    endpoint: https://{{Host}}/bid/ServerBidAdContent
+    pbs-enforces-gdpr: true

+    modifying-vast-xml-allowed: true
+    deprecated-names:
+    aliases:
+    meta-info:
+      maintainer-email: system_operations@invibes.com
+      app-media-types:
+        - banner
